Performer:
149.md (吉田玉佳)

Dates: '1985-'

Specialty: Puppeteer

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.


Performances as Puppeteer:

February 1987: The Courtesan Yugiri

August 1987: Madame Butterfly

January 1988: The Story of Priest Roben

January 1989: The Amorous Courier

March 1989: Yoshitsune and a Thousand Cherry Trees

July 1990: The Bloodshed at Ise

September 1990: The Adachi Plain in Oshu

December 1990: The Amorous Courier

October 1991: The Trouble in the Date Household

April 1991: The New Usuyuki Story

May 1992: The Story of Priest Roben

April 1993: The Tycoon's Exploit

November 1993: The Loyal Samurai
